Package org.thewhitemage13.interfaces

Interface ValidationServiceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ValidationServiceImpl
public interface ValidationServiceInterface
Interface for validation services across various user-related operations.

This interface defines the validation methods for checking various aspects of a user's account, such as username, phone number, password, email, media, followers, and more. It provides methods for validating data when creating or updating users, as well as performing checks related to user activity, posts, and subscriptions.

Key Methods:

  • validateUsername(String) validates the username for proper format and availability.
  • validateUpdateUser(CreateUserDTO, User) validates user data for updating an existing profile.
  • validatePost(Long) checks if the user has valid posts in the system.
  • validateUpdatePhoneNumber(String, String) validates a phone number update.
  • validatePhoneNumber(String, String) validates the phone number for a new user or update.
  • validatePassword(String) ensures that the password meets security requirements.
  • validatePicture(CreateUserDTO) ensures that the provided profile picture URL is valid.
  • validateMedia(Long) checks the media associated with a userâ€™s posts.
  • validateFollowing(Long) validates the count of users the user is following.
  • validateFollowers(Long) validates the count of followers a user has.
  • validateEmail(String) validates a user's email format and availability.
  • validateUpdateEmail(String) validates an email update for correctness and availability.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

  • Method Details

    • validateUsername

      void validateUsername(String username)
      Validates the username to ensure it is correctly formatted and not already taken.

      This method checks if the username adheres to the required format (e.g., no special characters) and if the username is available for use (not already taken by another user).

      Parameters:
      username - the username to validate

    • validateUpdateUser

      String validateUpdateUser(CreateUserDTO createUserDTO, User updateUser) throws com.google.i18n.phonenumbers.NumberParseException
      Validates the user data when updating an existing user profile.

      This method checks the validity of the data provided for updating an existing user profile. It checks for conflicts with existing data and ensures the data is formatted correctly.

      Parameters:
      createUserDTO - the new user data provided for the update
      updateUser - the existing user entity that is being updated
      Returns:
      a string indicating the result of the validation process
      Throws:
      com.google.i18n.phonenumbers.NumberParseException - if there is an issue with the phone number format

    • validatePost

      Long validatePost(Long userId)
      Validates the number of posts associated with a user.

      This method checks if the number of posts for a given user is valid.

      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose posts are to be validated
      Returns:
      the number of posts associated with the user

    • validateUpdatePhoneNumber

      String validateUpdatePhoneNumber(String phoneNum, String region) throws com.google.i18n.phonenumbers.NumberParseException
      Validates a phone number when updating it.

      This method validates the format and correctness of a phone number when it is being updated.

      Parameters:
      phoneNum - the phone number to validate
      region - the region code for phone number validation
      Returns:
      a string indicating the result of the validation process
      Throws:
      com.google.i18n.phonenumbers.NumberParseException - if the phone number format is invalid

    • validatePhoneNumber

      String validatePhoneNumber(String phoneNumber, String region) throws com.google.i18n.phonenumbers.NumberParseException
      Validates the phone number for a new user or an update.

      This method ensures the phone number is valid according to the specified region.

      Parameters:
      phoneNumber - the phone number to validate
      region - the region code for phone number validation
      Returns:
      a string indicating the result of the validation process
      Throws:
      com.google.i18n.phonenumbers.NumberParseException - if the phone number format is invalid

    • validatePassword

      void validatePassword(String password)
      Validates a password to ensure it meets the required security standards.

      This method checks if the password adheres to predefined security rules, such as length and complexity.

      Parameters:
      password - the password to validate

    • validatePicture

      void validatePicture(CreateUserDTO createUserDTO)
      Validates the profile picture URL provided by the user.

      This method checks if the provided profile picture URL is valid and accessible.

      Parameters:
      createUserDTO - the user data containing the profile picture URL

    • validateMedia

      List<String> validateMedia(Long userId)
      Validates the media URLs associated with a user's posts.

      This method checks if the media URLs associated with a userâ€™s posts are valid and accessible.

      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose media URLs are to be validated
      Returns:
      a list of valid media URLs associated with the user

    • validateFollowing

      Long validateFollowing(Long userId)
      Validates the count of users that the user is following.

      This method ensures that the following count of a user is valid and within acceptable limits.

      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose following count is to be validated
      Returns:
      the number of users the given user is following

    • validateFollowers

      Long validateFollowers(Long userId)
      Validates the count of followers a user has.

      This method ensures that the follower count of a user is valid and within acceptable limits.

      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose follower count is to be validated
      Returns:
      the number of followers of the given user

    • validateEmail

      void validateEmail(String email)
      Validates the email address to ensure it is in the correct format and available for use.

      This method checks the format of the email address and ensures that it is not already in use.

      Parameters:
      email - the email address to validate

    • validateUpdateEmail

      void validateUpdateEmail(String email)
      Validates an email update to ensure the new email address is correctly formatted and available for use.

      This method checks the format of the new email address and ensures it is not already in use by another user.

      Parameters:
      email - the new email address to validate
